Field Notes

Quiet observations from the lo-fi underground.

Kitchen Song

Opal Mag’s 'Kitchen Song' drifts like a diary entry set to reverb—ambient pop made for quiet rituals, soft solitude, and lo-fi stillness.

July 26, 2025 – lofi, ambient, indie-pop, bedroom-recording

Lo-Fi Stranger Vibes

2HR lo-fi mix inspired by Stranger Things. From analog warmth to otherworldly chill.

May 26, 2025 – lo-fi, chillbeats, chillhop, chillvibes, strangerthings, ambient
